item.title: Videomaker - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!
We are working on a Ukrainian mobile application builder https://yourmodule.com/. We are currently looking for a person who can make a demo video of the product. We expect that in the video we will show the advantages, values, results of the product (mobile application) and how it works.

What we want to get:
1) video script (we would like to get creative from the freelancer and jointly choose a suitable script)
2) video up to one minute
3) video in two languages ​: Ukrainian and English (we are ready to work with a freelancer who doesn't know Ukrainian, but this will be an advantage)

We are considering both options - animated videos and with the participation of real people. We are also considering options with voice acting or subtitles.
In the future, if we have successful cooperation, we would also like to invite a specialist to create a promotional video for YouTube.

Please indicate the approximate amount of work (hours) or price.
We will also definitely look at the portfolio.

We aren't ready to work with freelancers located in russia or belarus.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Animation
Skills: Demo Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Animation
Country: Ukraine
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for English YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to edit 4-8 minute videos for our English YouTube channel that focuses on roulette tips. As the editor, your main responsibility will be to take the voiceovers we provide and combine them with stock or AI footage to create engaging and visually appealing videos. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and a strong understanding of visual storytelling. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are crucial.

  - Creative storytelling
  - Attention to detail

item.title: Creative Video Editor for Educational Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and talented video editor to join our team and work on editing 3-5 minute educational videos. The ideal candidate should have experience in both video editing and storytelling, with a strong attention to detail. This role requires the ability to work independently and collaborate effectively with our content team. As a video editor, you will be responsible for enhancing the quality of our educational videos by adding graphics, animations, and sound effects. The final videos should be engaging, informative, and visually appealing. If you have a passion for education and a knack for creative editing, we would love to hear from you.

Fluency in English is essential.

Skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong storytelling skills
- Attention to detail
- Knowledge of motion graphics and animation
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Creative problem-solving


Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: CapCut - Upwork
item.description:
Do you want to grow your experience working with an American law firm making educational videos?
Do you want to work in a business were you will have direct access to make the change that you wanna see in the world?  
Culture matters! Join our great team!

You will be working directly with Attorney Jesus O. Valentino. You will find him to be a very capable speaker and team leader.

Probate Prime by Valentino Law PLLC is a law firm in the USA that aims to make educational videos to help improve understanding about their legal service.  

Your goal is to (1) create Prime Video Plans that plan out the topic of videos (a) title (b) thumbnail (c) graphics required (d) PowerPoint presentation in the background (d) content (e) publication schedule;, (2) be present while the video is being recorded to assist in production, (3) edit the video, (4) publish on YouTube and Linkedin according the the schedule.

We are look for a person who is charming and has a nice speaking voice which would allow them to interact with the subject of video with verbal follow up questions. Handsome or beautiful voice preferred.

Candidates must speak fluent English.
Please read the following reading passage and submit a link of your recording, using the website Vocaroo.  Read with a smile.
READING PASSAGE ENGLISH
An elephant slept in his bunk
And in slumber his chest rose and sunk
He snored how he snored
All the other beasts roared
So his wife tied a knot in his trunk.

Please provide links to your videos you have worked on and attach any video plans you have previously created.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 12:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 3D Animator and Video Editor for City Promo Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled 3D Animator and Video Editor to support us in creating a 3D animation of a new city development. Our client is developing a new city and wants to showcase a realistic yet not overly detailed animation of how the city might look in the future. If possible, we would like you to create a promo video that incorporates both the 3D animation and some stock footage clips.

Project Details:

- 3D Model: We have an untextured 3D model of the city.
- Animation: Create a realistic animation of the city using the 3D model.
- Video Editing: (Optional) Edit the animation and incorporate stock video clips to create a cohesive promo video.
- Deadline: Delivery of the 3D animation and the complete promo video within 2 weeks from the start date.

Requirements:

-Experience: Experience in 3D modeling, texturing, and animation. Experience in video editing and creating promotional videos is a plus.
- Skills: Proficiency in 3D animation software (e.g., Blender, Maya, 3ds Max) and video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Attention to Detail: Ability to make the city look realistic and visually appealing, even if it’s not super detailed.
- Communication: Good communication skills to discuss project details, provide updates, and handle feedback and revisions.
- Reliability: Ability to provide a reliable estimate of costs, including potential edits and changes to the model and video.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and texture the existing 3D model of the city.
- Create a realistic 3D animation showcasing the city.
- (Optional) Edit and incorporate stock footage to create a complete promo video.
- Collaborate with us to ensure the final product meets the client’s expectations.
- Deliver the final 3D animation and promo video within the agreed timeframe.

How to Apply:

Please submit your proposal with:

- Examples of previous 3D animation and/or video editing work.
- A reliable cost estimate, including potential revisions.
- Your availability to start and complete the project within the given timeframe.
- We look forward to reviewing your proposals and working with a talented professional to bring our client’s vision to life!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 11:27 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Architectural Design, 3D Modeling, Animation, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Architectural Design, 3D Modeling, Animation, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Austria
click to apply

item.title: Motion Video Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Motion Video Designer. As a Motion Video Designer, you will be responsible for creating a visually stunning and engaging video for a new product launch.

The video will have text and motions to showcase a new product launch.

1. Talk about the product features
2. Present the product in an engaging and attractive way
3. Present 6 products all in one video (mockups attached)
4. We'll provide with the script but motion and creative ideas on how to present would be required from you
5. Video duration: 30-40 seconds in IG reel resolution

Product is: healthy snack pouches. We have mock ups available for these pouches to work with.

You should have a strong understanding of motion graphics, video editing, and visual storytelling. The ideal candidate will have experience using industry-standard software and tools such as Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Illustrator.

Skills required:
- Motion graphics
- Video editing
- Visual storytelling
- Adobe After Effects
- Premiere Pro
- Illustrator

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 17, 2024 11:11 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Food & Beverage, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Food & Beverage, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: India
click to apply
